section.name: Get Involved
section.p: To contact the EJBCA team or to contribute please contact the project administrator, who can be found on the sourceforge project page.

section.name: Contributors
section.p: We encourage and appreciate all contributions. Here is the list of all people who have donated their valuable time to EJBCA.

ul.li: Tomas Gustavsson tomas(at)primekey.se, project founder.
Anna Diruba Christensen dilnet(at)hotmail.com, project homepage design.
Nathan Phelps nphelps(at)solarc.com, testing, bugfinding and suggestions.
Leo Tai hkleo(at)users.sourceforge.net, Oracle database configuration.
Timothy Fisher timothyf(at)users.sourceforge.net], architecture overview.
Karl-König Königsson karlkoenig(at)users.sourceforge.net, better deployment scripts.
Thomas Karlsson thomas.karlsson(at)planet.eu.org, firewall script.
Magnus Broqvist magnus(at)han.pp.se, initial P12toPEM implementation.
Slava Sklarewski Slava.Sklarewski(at)de.gi-de.com, data flow diagram.
Leonardo Souza Mario Bueno isbueno(at)users.sourceforge.net, patch for request template path.
Jean ? icejean(at)21cn.com, support for Sybase and Active Directory, port to Java 1.2/EJB 1.0, suggestions and bugfixes.
Philip Vendil philip(at)primekey.se, web administration
Lars Silven lars(at)primekey.se, external connection to smart card personalisation, various additions.
Gösta Bäckström, gosta.backstrom(at)goyada.com, initial PKCS7 to browsers.
Ville Skyttä, ville.skytta(at)secgo.com, AdminCertReqServlet, various patches
Koen Serry, koen(at)serry.org, many improvements.
Dickon Field, Dickon.Field(at)concise.co.uk, Weblogic 7.1.
Justin Wood, justin(at)braidquest.com, PKI Tools subproject.
Thomas Meckel, meckel(at)ophios.com, OCSP.
Jon Barber, jon.barber(at)acm.org, SCEP testing and fixes.
surd0007(at)yahoo.com.cn, install guide.
Mike Jackson, mj(at)sci.fi, Proper LDAP schema.
Stephane Bailliez , patches all over, XDoclet.
James A. Rome , additional 'Use fields in DN' for publisher.
Manuel Ruiz , make admin commands flexible and usable from within java-code
